programme.title: The Kitchen

programme.title: Food Paradise

programme.desc: In a city celebrated for its beloved beverages, Dublin, Ireland's, food does not disappoint. Andrew Zimmern examines edible Irish icons from smoked salmon, soda bread and stew to boxty, black pudding and, of course, Guinness.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern is in El Paso, where Texas meets Mexico on the border as well as in the kitchen. The city is filled to the brim of its 10-gallon hat with Tex-Mex cuisine as well as Mexican classics.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew checks out the vibrant and flavorful fusions of Antigua Guatemala. This locale is home to sacred food traditions and cultural mashups of Mayan and Spanish heritage. His adventure includes colorful enchiladas, tiny tamales and traditional sweets.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew heads to Frankfurt where he samples everything from the classic frankfurter and apple wine to pork shoulder with sauerkraut and hand cheese with music.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern shows off the tempting flavors of Cartagena, Colombia. From fried fish and sizzling egg arepas to bedroom-boosting fruits and seafood stews, the taste of the coast infuses every bite.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb travels to Minnesota's largest city, where he tries a legendary burger that's become a regional icon, noshes on a gigantic brunch meal served with its own food Ferris wheel and takes on a massive four-pound banh mi behemoth.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey's latest delicious detour brings him to Saint Paul for an indoor food truck park, a timeless diner and a terrible twosome of crepes and Thai rolled ice cream.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb lands in Worcester, MA, where he slurps down some radical ramen, indulges in peanut butter cup French toast and takes on a rack of deep-fried ribs with the heat of a million Scoville units.

programme.title: Man v. Food Nation
programme.desc: Casey Webb's epic eating expedition brings him to Baltimore for an out-of-this-world diner, a classic crab feast and a four-pound pho fight.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: In Casey's years of facing off against food, he's taken on his fair share of heat. Casey's counting down the hottest, culminating in a challenge so spicy it may crack the Scoville scale and the number.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Armed with a serious love of food and years of experience in the restaurant business, Casey Webb travels the country in search of America's most delicious dishes and ultimate eating challenges.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses

programme.title: With Love, Christmas

programme.title: A Cheerful Christmas

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.

programme.title: Double Holiday
programme.desc: A woman is tasked with throwing her companies holiday party, with her nemesis. The two must work together to mingle work and traditions to make the party a success.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur invents a new dating app designed to help singles find dates to events. She personally tests it out in the weeks before Christmas and is connected with a like-minded individual whom she's already dated, several times.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.

programme.title: Holiday Date

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor

programme.desc: Known for its sizzling performance and smooth body style, the '69 Pontiac GTO is one of the fastest cars of its time. Now, Joe gives it his signature twist with rad body mods and new power train that will have its super wide tires smokin' hot.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Ron's classic 1967 Plymouth Barracuda needs a motor, trans lines, and a lot of work under the hood. Recovering from recent heart surgery, only the Garage Squad can give Ron the help he needs to get this monster of Mopar back together again.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Danielle's 1968 Chevy Camaro 327 convertible was her dream car, but now it's her nightmare needing an overhaul from bumper to bumper. She lost all hope.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: On this episode, watch Tony Angelo, Lucky Costa and guest Lindsay Ross transform a banged-up 1987 Chevrolet G10 work van into a 1977 Boogie Van clone.(c)

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Lucky Costa's personal '66 Chevelle gets major upgrades to its 6.0L LS truck engine.(c)

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave finds an amazing deal for a rare VW Transporter pickup that is too good to pass up. His real dilemma, whether to keep it or auction it, begins after the modifications are complete.(c)

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: The owners of a run down '63 Grumman bread truck want it transformed into the ultimate t-shirt vending machine. Bill and the guys drop the giant truck to the floor with custom body modifications and a bar themed interior.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Arthur bought his Cyclone new in 1967, but then his father put 400,000 miles on it. Now, he wants FantomWorks to make it better than new. Antonio and his cousin Andres challenge Dan to build the fastest Mustang CS in Mexico.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: FantomWorks finish the build of the ultimate Mustang Sleeper for Antonio and Andres: a California Special powered by a Coyote Aluminator. Phil wants a 1949 Chevy Pick-up like the one he rode in as a child, but the truck is a disassembled jigsaw puzzle.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: David is a Volkswagen fanatic who wants to outmatch muscle cars with a 1967 Beetle. FantomWorks will have to undo the bad repairs from at least three fiberglass rending accidents to give Robert the widened 1967 Corvette supercar he wants.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Tom asks Dan to find him a rare 1967 Camaro Convertible with factory AC, but once found, this Unicorn is too good to cut up. Dave wants Dan to build a safe, almost all stock '71 Datsun, but the car's badly damaged from previous restoration work.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Sean asks Dan to find a 1969 Camaro that can be built into the custom resto-mod of his dreams. Jeff wants to give his 1969 Cutlass a rare Hurst makeover, but the engine has never run and there are more parts in boxes than on the car.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Dave traded for his dream '57 Corvette over three decades ago, but his plans to build it have, so far, come to nothing. Ken picked a rare 1954 Kaiser Darrin from his father's collection, he now it's on FantomWorks to reverse the hands of time.(c)

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Larry wants to drive his uncle's prized '59 Cadillac DeVille, but the car has spent decades baking in the AZ sun. Brian spent years gathering parts to restore his grandfather's 1960 Bel Air only to find that he's still missing more critical components.(c)

programme.desc: Joe has big plans for one of his favorite cars, a '64 Lincoln Continental. He wants it long and low and the color of snow. But a faulty steering column and a close call in the shop threatens to turn this quick flip into a never-ending money pit.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: Fred and Dave blow the cobwebs off of two of their favorite muscle cars, the Mad Maxxis and the Dirt Pacer. They'll head to the Motor City of Detroit for some urban off-roading.(c)

programme.desc: When Fred buys an International Scout with a camper on top, it's time for an adventure. But first, he and Dave head to Anything Scout to fix up the old overlander and transform it into a trail machine with a house on the back.(c)

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve visits Cadillac King and uncovers a massive '68 Fleetwood and a '75 Calais six-door limo. He'll also try to bust the notion that all Caddys are gigantic with a '79 Seville Milan roadster and a '93 Allante.(c)

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve delivers a lesson about the birds and bees -- Plymouth Road Runners and Dodge Super Bees. In a private yard, he finds what might be the very last Super Bee of all, along with a Road Runner with colors fit for 'The King.(c)

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: The Crop Duster is a back-to-basics street and strip machine with big-block power. It's running its quickest quarter mile ever, running in the 11s in no-prep track conditions.(c)

programme.desc: John Andrade Jr. from Street Outlaws joins the guys in a messy battle, when a '75 dirt-track Camaro goes head-to-head with a big-block-powered Toyota mud truck on a makeshift drag strip down the center of a mud park.(c)

programme.desc: Restoring a Split Window Corvette runs into unexpected problems. The owner of a '63 Corvette never had time or money to keep it running. After dozens of swap meets searching for the parts to rebuild the car, he's still nowhere close.(c)

programme.title: GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey preps the Stunt Double's bed with fender flairs, a roll bar and some blazing spotlights to keep that 'Fall Guy' look with a modern twist. Then, it's on to the Gladiator build, where Stacey makes sure the search and rescue rig can see in the dark.(c)

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne resurrects a 1962 Jaguar XKE SI 3.8 Flat Floor Roadster once owned by Today Show host, Dave Garroway. And what do an OSCA MT4 race car, a million-dollar 8-liter Bentley and a questionable '71 Siata Spring have in common? Carini of course.(c)

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The guys head to Angelo's shop in Pennsylvania for an insane project, cramming an entire second drivetrain into the rear of a Chevy Impala. Then it's off to a drag strip in New Jersey to put their creation through its paces.(c)

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis makes his way to the Highlands Motoring Festival in North Carolina. Plus, he talks weatherstripping solutions for a variety of applications.(c)

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: The Overhaulin' team has pulled off the ultimate prank: stealing Chip Foose's beloved '56 truck right out from under his nose and overhauled it over the course of four months! A new side of Chip is revealed as the prankster gets pranked.(n)

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy's vision for big ideas leads to a huge opportunity for the shop. If he pulls off the build as promised, he could secure future business for years to come. And with a little help from his dad, he has the opportunity to boost his own collection.(n)

programme.title: Car Fix
programme.desc: The guys find out the hard way what happens when they put a 6.2 liter supercharged Hellcrate engine in a '73 Challenger. When the factory rear end blows up, they swap it out for an upgrade with the right gear setup.(n)

programme.title: All Girls Garage
programme.desc: The girls help a Mustang owner with a spinal cord injury finish some interior parts on his classic Mustang. They also properly hang the mufflers and add some new rear shocks.(n)

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian needs a new FourWheeler shop truck, but he doesn't just buy new trucks, he builds them. So he'll tear down a two-door Dodge Dakota and turn it into a custom tools-carrying monster.(n)

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky jump headfirst into the dirt-track world. They scoop up an old, beat-up Nova, drop a basic 350 in it, and take it to compete on a super-fast half-mile oval in Selinsgrove, Pennsylvania.(n)

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Matt and Bruno have a new LJ Jeep in the shop to get some performance goodies and other cool styling options. Matt thinks it's a good idea to put it through the mud, but Bruno is not so sure. He thinks it's more of a Mall Crawler than a Mud Crawler.(n)

programme.desc: Samantha wants a dress that shows off her tattoo, but her mom hates the tattoo and wants to keep it covered. Singer Vanessa needs a 1930's dress for her jazz-inspired wedding. With only a month to go, Aja's fitting leaves no margin for error.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Comedian Seth Meyers surprises an injured army vet. Southern model Ashley wants a sexy dress that also impresses her picky father. Dana returns for a fitting before her wedding with her college sweetheart at their alma mater.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Miss USA Erin Brady is ready to find her dream dress, but she must also please her mother-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Rebekah is a survivor of the Boston Marathon bombings, and she has just one month to find a dress for her dream wedding. Tall bride Gianna needs a gown with extra length, but she has high expectations for the 'once-in-a-lifetime' dress she envisions.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Actress Laurel is on tour with the musical 'Wicked,' and she wants a dress that doesn't resemble her stage costumes. Picky bride Kea has already tried on more than 100 dresses! Mackenzie worries her beach dress will be too short to cover her bare feet.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Three brides hope Kleinfeld can top the dream dresses they've already found. Lucille found a satin dress, but still wants more bling. Dana is head-over-heels for a tulle gown her mom hates. Joan loves a dress back home but wants one unique to Kleinfeld.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Whytnee wants a sexy dress to suit her vixen image, Carla wants to show more skin than her mother would like, and 52-years-young Dina is ready to try on her gown, saying it will fit right if it fits tight.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Sometimes, a bride's entourage is bossy instead of helpful. Tenisha wants lots of bling, but her bridesmaids insist on other styles. Elyse's mom demands she try on a pink ball gown. Adriana's family argues over the length of her hem.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Host Courtney Cason only wants a Mark Zunino gown, and she gets a huge surprise at Kleinfeld. Zabrina looks for an extravagant ball gown for her Near Year's Eve wedding, and Cheryl is nervous to try on her custom dress because she has never seen it.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Kristin is torn between looking sexy or traditional. Alexa also wants a dress with sex appeal, but she needs to please her conservative dad. Diana can't decide between a flowy or structured gown.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Alyssa calls her father 'Dadzilla,' and his opinions rule the day. Wedding planner Michelle feels extra pressure to find the perfect dress. When Emily's custom Pnina gown is all wrong, her dad 'Papazilla' demands a solution.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Paralympic snowboarder Amy Purdy isn't afraid to take risks, like waiting to find her dress just three weeks before the big day. Katie is the ultimate planner and brings a list ranking her top gowns.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: 'High School Musical' star Corbin Bleu joins his fiancée, Sasha, to find her dream dress. Bride Katie wants a classic ball gown, but her fiancé would like something sexier.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Lauren has a $2,000 budget but is in love with a dress that will blow that budget to shreds. Shoshana is a struggling actress, paying for her own dress to complete her special day. Sara is way over budget and has to convince her father it's worth it.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Randy's Most Memorable Appointments
programme.desc: Bride Lauren loves dressing sexy, but she also wants a gown that will still feel bridal. Ali wants to look like Beyoncé on her big day, so she'll need a sexy gown with tons of sparkle. Blair bought a very sexy dress and hopes her grandmother approves.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Krystle loves attention, but her friends may not agree on her over-the-top sexy dress. Maria wants a pure white princess or mermaid gown, but shocks her pastor father with a sexy sheer bodice. Jaclyn faces a major dress dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Country music star Kristian Bush joins his friends to find bride Evyn's perfect dress for her Nashville wedding. Chelsea struggles with dress overload after trying on more than 70 gowns. Melanie is nervous her dress won't fit her plus size frame.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Joelle tries on her mother's 1987 Kleinfeld dress, but is not sure if she is ready to walk down the aisle '80s style. Randy and Antonella know it's going to be a rough appointment when bride LeAnne declares she's the ultimate anti-bride.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Bachelor alum Caila found her real-life prince charming, but to find her fairy-tale gown she must listen to her heart. Ridicule for her love of feathers has Jocelyn heartbroken and her consultant scrambling. Plus, a birthday surprise is in the works.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Alexis wants to look naked on her wedding day, and Courtney's last-minute indecision puts Randy to the test.(n)

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel's older brother returns to Atlanta with his foreign bride. The family welcomes her with open arms, but their speedy marriage sparks Chantel's suspicion. She takes her sister-in-law out to learn more. In the Dominican Republic, Nicole is in love.(n)

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel's suspicions about Royal's relationship with Angenette grow after talking to Winter and River. As Pedro plans a trip to NYC, Chantel gets big news about her graduation. Sibling secrets come out when tempers flare during a holiday photo shoot.(n)
